title: Project Design
description: Part 1 of a 2 semester project design and implementation sequence conjoined with Technical Communications. Prepare requirements, design and project plans.  Develop a basic prototype of the desired system. Project is completed in CS 3312-Project Implementation. Credit will not be awared for CS 3311 and CS 4911.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 2340 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (CS 3001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 4001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 4002 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 4003 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 4726 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or SLS 3110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
